description: REM RDI at 5% oxygen desaturation  [(Total number of apneas and hypopneas in REM sleep associated with >= 5% oxygen desaturation) / (hours of REM sleep)]
calculation: 60 * ( hrembp5 + hrop5 + carbp5 + carop5 + oarbp5 + oarop5 ) / minremp

hybrid.LABEL: Calculated - Overall rem RDI at 5% oxygen desaturation
